p: According to between groups' analysis, groups treated with repeated daily doses of aqueous fractions of 100, 200, and 400â€‰mg/kg AIRE resulted in a considerable BGL reduction at the 7 th day and 14 th day compared to their baseline values ( Table 7). Moreover, there was a statistically significant ( p < 0.01) and ( p < 0.001) reduction of BGL in the GLC-treated group at 7 th day and 14 th day, respectively, compared to baseline values with around 61.30% and 64.10% reduction, respectively.
